name: EasyConnect
body: This is a Windows tabbed remote desktop application whose UI was designed to resemble Chrome's.  Currently it supports Microsoft's Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP), but will soon have a plugin architecture designed to enable third-party support for other protocols such as VNC, Citrix, etc.
tagline: Tabbed remote desktop application with a Chrome-like UI.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
